import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../../styles/PatientList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PatientList=()=>{// Mock data - in a real app, this would come from an API
const patients=[{id:1,name:'John Doe',age:45,condition:'Hypertension'},{id:2,name:'Jane Smith',age:32,condition:'Diabetes'},{id:3,name:'Robert Johnson',age:58,condition:'Arthritis'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"patient-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Patient List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/doctor/patient/add",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Add New Patient"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"patients-grid",children:patients.map(patient=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"patient-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:patient.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"patient-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Age:"})," ",patient.age]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Condition:"})," ",patient.condition]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"patient-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/doctor/patient/${patient.id}`,className:"btn btn-secondary",children:"View Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/doctor/recommendations/${patient.id}`,className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Recommendations"})]})]},patient.id))})]});};export default PatientList;
